attributes.action: Keep the Post Office Card Account 2 as a Post Office Product
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This scheme has been of great benifit to over 4 million people and it would be a disaster if the Card System was put out to another retail outlet or forcing people to travel miles to receive their benifits or having to open a bank account so that the banks can make even bigger profits, the most needy in the community will be the sufferers in this Early Day Motion 1506 if it goes through Parliement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
